entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers this evening then 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending after midnight then clearing. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 17 January 2023
